<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Strix Vengeance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2650) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Trigger**
You, or a strix ally you can see, are damaged by an enemy's critical hit.

</column>

---

You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin. Until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional +1d6 damage on Strikes against the triggering enemy. The bonus increases to +2d6 if you use a [_striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon or unarmed attack and +3d6 if you use a _major striking_ weapon or unarmed attack.
name: Strix Vengeance
